availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James B. Gaines (Shelby County, Kentucky, and Smithland, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, and Smithland, Kentucky, physician. Married Henrietta F. Beaty Gaines in Shelby County in January 1843. Father of Julius A Gaines, Francis M Gaines, Sarah A Gaines, and Mary J Gaines. Graduate of Transylvania University in Lexington, Kentucky, in 1844. Resident of Shelby County. Relocated to Smithland in 1863. Practiced medicine in Livingston County, Kentucky; Edmonson County, Kentucky; Butler County, Kentucky; and Ohio County, Kentucky.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 35B
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Shelby County Marriages, Film #000259274, p. 81
